solution_line_template: The available number of people in each car is {max_per_car} * {num_cars} cars = <<{max_per_car}*{num_cars}={car_capacity}>>{car_capacity} people.
The available number of people in each van is {max_per_van} * {num_vans} vans = <<{max_per_van}*{num_vans}={van_capacity}>>{van_capacity} people.
The total number of people that could go with the team is {car_capacity} people + {van_capacity} people = <<{car_capacity}+{van_capacity}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} people.
The team took with them {num_cars} cars * {people_per_car} people = <<{num_cars}*{people_per_car}={people_in_cars}>>{people_in_cars} people.
The team also took {num_vans} vans * {people_per_van} people = <<{num_vans}*{people_per_van}={people_in_vans}>>{people_in_vans} people.
The team brought {people_in_cars} people + {people_in_vans} people =<<{people_in_cars}+{people_in_vans}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
The team could bring an additional {total_capacity} people - {total_people} people = <<{total_capacity}-{total_people}={additional_people}>>{additional_people} people.
